comment.author: 25100796@N08
comment._content: But what uniform?  It looks vaguely British, but - except for the two bars on the right sleeve - there are no indications of rank, corps, or regiment.  Wikipedia states that Tanner served in the  Red Cross Public Information Department during the war.  The uniform could, perhaps, have been a self-designed affair put together by local tailors.  However, if he is a member of the Red Cross, the absence of that insignia is puzzling.
